definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Type the text that appears as a hyperlink in your document.
sentences.chinese: 鍵入在文檔中作爲超級鏈接顯示的文本。

sentences.english: Hyper link can be photos, 3-dimensional pictures, texts and procedures, etc.
sentences.chinese: 超級鏈接可以是照片，三維圖片，文本和程序等。

sentences.english: DO NOT leave hyperlink to this forum on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 不要在網上的任何地方留本論壇的超級鏈接。
